I found that while the effects for the most part were good and the acting was decent enough, the overall story-line was just too cliche for my tastes. Now I know some people will criticize me and claim it was all based on some comic but honestly, if a movie is going to be packed with that much stereotypical content then the script should be revised or it shouldn't be filmed. 

Overall it was a decent action flick and worth a one time watch if you don't expect much of it. Hope this helps!
